import React from 'react'; import { ArrowIcon, ExploreCardIcon1, ExploreCardIcon2, ExploreCardIcon3 } from "../../assets/icons"; import "./ExploreCard.scss"; import { Link, NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; const ExploreCard = ({ image, title, author, text, peoples, area, price }) => { return (

{title}

{author}
Explore More

{text}

{ peoples ?
  • {peoples} Mil People
  • {area} km2
  • ${price}
Need Directions ?
: undefined }
) } export default ExploreCard;
